events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your website but received the wrong size and would like to request a refund for this item.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to shipment of an incorrect product size.
The case has been assigned to an available customer service agent for resolution.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the size issue with your jacket. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the jacket you received so I can verify the error?
Sure, the order number is 123456 and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong size label on the jacket.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid label to return the incorrect jacket.
That sounds great, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed and return instructions were sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We wanted to check in to confirm you have received the refund and to ensure everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
